text: Susana Shizuko Higuchi Miyagawa ( ; 26 April 1950 – 8 December 2021) was a Peruvian politician and engineer. She was First Lady of Peru from 1990 to 1994 as the wife of President Alberto Fujimori. She was a member of the Congress for two terms from 2000 to 2006. Higuchi died on 8 December 2021 at a hospital in Lima, Peru from cancer at the age of 71.Muere Susana Higuchi, ex primera dama de Alberto Fujimori que luego lo denunció por corrupción y abusos ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2021 deaths Category:First Ladies of Peru Category:Peruvian engineers Category:Politicians from Lima Category:Cancer deaths in Peru
title: Susana Higuchi
